channel.title: [Deathlypvpz] fix deposit worn items

item.title: [Deathlypvpz] fix deposit worn items
item.dc:creator: @xX4m4zingXx xX4m4zingXx
item.description:
@xX4m4zingXx wrote:

i want to make that when you click on the button that it places your worn items into the bank
i added this to my clickingbuttons.java

case 82024: if (!c.isBanking) { c.getPA().closeAllWindows(); for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Abuse]: "+Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)+" Tried to Bank Hack - Stopped."); } } return; } for(int i = 0; i < c.playerEquipment.length; i++) { c.getItems().bankItem(c.playerEquipment[i], i,c.playerEquipment[i]); } break;

but that isnâ€™t working. i copied that from the deposit inventory here is it

case 82020: if (!c.isBanking) { c.getPA().closeAllWindows(); for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Abuse]: "+Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)+" Tried to Bank Hack - Stopped."); } } return; } for(int i = 0; i < c.playerItems.length; i++) { c.getItems().bankItem(c.playerItems[i], i,c.playerItemsN[i]); } break;

Read full topic
